column4: Hello! Is there any software that will allow me to read (and perhaps write) into my ext3 partition when I am running Windows XP?
let me see if I can find the name of it..
ah you have just given me some relief. Thanks a lot. I know I can search on Google, but if somebody here gives me the info, I would be most thrilled.
i dont know about writing though.. but i know it reads
